title: How to Make Slow Cooker Hot Cocoa

steps.headline: Make the initial cocoa mixture.
steps.description: Stir the cocoa mix and hot water together in a small bowl.

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients in a slow cooker.
steps.description: Use a wire whisk to stir everything together.

steps.headline: Allow the mixture to heat for 3 hours on a low setting.
steps.description: Stir the mixture once an hour to ensure everything is mixed.

steps.headline: Serve immediately or keep the slow cooker on a "Keep Warm" setting.

text: Make the initial cocoa mixture. Stir the cocoa mix and hot water together in a small bowl. Add all the ingredients in a slow cooker. Use a wire whisk to stir everything together. Allow the mixture to heat for 3 hours on a low setting. Stir the mixture once an hour to ensure everything is mixed. Serve immediately or keep the slow cooker on a "Keep Warm" setting.
